text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg This is not political. It is outrage at not telling ALL UK parents that if they catch coronavirus, it's okay to jump in the car & travel to the other end of the country. That should have been in the rules from the start. But it now is, as you & your colleagues just added it. 1/2
